dc_description_s: Imprint derived from the atlas in which this state of the map was issued.; Previous state issued in the 1817 edition of "A New General Atlas"; date and engraver's name removed.; "Drawn & Engraved for Thomson's New General Atlas."; Numbered "42."; Shows boundaries, rivers and principal settlements; colouring shows possession.; Relief shown by hachures and shading.; Greenwich meridian.|51 x 60 centimeters|Scale [1: 3,000,000]|General Map Collection
